title: Geography of South America: countries of the Andes
brief_description: Views of the mountains, the highlands and the people against a historical and geographical survey of Bolivia, Ecuador, Peru and Chile. The main topographical regions in relationship to the resources and cultural development of these Andean nations, pointing out that although primitive in many respects, these countries hold the promise of a bright and prosperous future.
